title: Fantasy Artist Genius Guide Vol 2 - 2014  USA
description:
Fantasy Artist Genius Guide Vol 2 - 2014  USA

196 Pages | True PDF | English | 25 MB 


Delving into the wonderful world of fantasy art, this book will guide you through creating stunning characters, creatures, landscapes and more. Covering Photoshop, Painter, PaintTool SAI, ArtRage and more, professional artists will show you how to create amazing artwork that's out of this world! Featuring: Portrait & character - Paint perfect fantasy portraits and design manga and steampunk characters. Concept - Let your imagination run wild and design stunning sci-fi scenes. Landscapes - Create sprawling cityscapes and futuristic vistas. Creatures - Construct mythical and magical beasts.
